# gcore_k8s_pool (Data Source)

Represent k8s cluster's pool.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider gcore {
  user_name = "test"
  password = "test"
  gcore_platform = "https://api.gcdn.co"
  gcore_api = "https://api.cloud.gcorelabs.com"
}

data "gcore_k8s_pool" "v" {
  project_id = 1
  region_id = 1
  cluster_id = "6bf878c1-1ce4-47c3-a39b-6b5f1d79bf25"
  pool_id = "dc3a3ea9-86ae-47ad-a8e8-79df0ce04839"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- **cluster_id** (String)
- **pool_id** (String)

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
- **project_id** (Number)
- **project_name** (String)
- **region_id** (Number)
- **region_name** (String)

### Read-Only

- **created_at** (String)
- **docker_volume_size** (Number)
- **docker_volume_type** (String) Available value is 'standard', 'ssd_hiiops', 'cold', 'ultra'.
- **flavor_id** (String)
- **is_default** (Boolean)
- **max_node_count** (Number)
- **min_node_count** (Number)
- **name** (String)
- **node_count** (Number)
- **stack_id** (String)
